name: Bruce Timm
info:
• 简体中文名: 布鲁斯·提姆
  • 别名: Bruce W. Timm
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1961年2月5日
  • 职业: 动画制片人、电视制片人、作家、导演、系列合作人
detail: Bruce Walter Timm (born on February 5, 1961), is an animator and Television producer. He is also a writer and artist working in comics. He is well known for his contributions building the modern DCAU
